bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/4055>http://code.opencv.org/issues/4055</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| minh nguyen on 2014-12-10 05:07 || Priority: Normal || Affected: 2.4.0 - 2.4.8 || Category: android || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: Hard || PR: || Platform: ARM / Android </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>VideoCapture crashes in Samsung Tablet 4 8.0</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>I need OpenCV and TouchFreeLibrary to catch gesture from front camera for air gesture app. App runs smoothly in phones but crash in tablet (I just try it in samsung tablet 4 8.0).
"OpenCV libs init was ok!" but app force stop after log sentence "initCameraConnect: preview format is set to 640x480" with error: Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV) at 0x00000000 (code=1) I debug and see "No implementation found for native Lorg/opencv/highgui/VideoCapture;.n_VideoCapture:(I)J"
Please help me how to fix it or can I use other method or any way to resolve it. Thanks! </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>minh nguyen on 2014-12-10 06:36</denchmark-h>
